data.title: Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University on LinkedIn: Borys Grinchenko (1863
data.meta_description: Borys Grinchenko (1863-1910) is a Ukrainian scholar and public figure, educator, writer, lexicographer and linguist. Throughout his life, he developed andâ€¦
data.text:
On June 12-13, 2024, with the support of the National Erasmus+ Office in Ukraine and the Austrian Organization for Education and Internationalization OeAD, a multilateral meeting of more than 40 Ukrainian universities with Austrian HEIs Erasmus+ Cooperation Seminar for Austrian and Ukrainian HEIs took place in Vienna, Austria. Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University was represented by Olha Vyhovska, Head of Scientific-Research Laboratory of Internationalization of Higher Education. https://lnkd.in/dNufCZQq

From April 29 to May 03, 2024, within the framework of the Erasmus+ staff mobility for teaching program, the lecturers of Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University were on academic mobility to the University of Palermo UniversitÃ  degli studi di Palermo The team of philologists presented at the Faculty of Philology and Philosophy the scientific and journalistic publication "Ban Ruscism", a significant project of Grinchenko University. They also discussed the challenges of teaching philological disciplines, in particular at the Department of Slavic Studies, and the change in priorities of Italian students in choosing to study Slavic languages. After the enemy's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the number of students choosing to study Russian has significantly decreased, as opposed to Ukrainian, which is growing in popularity every year

This May 2024, as part of cooperation with APS Maria Grzegorzewska University (Akademia Pedagogiki Specjalnej im. Marii Grzegorzewskiej) a delegation from Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University attended the course Â«Integrative and Inclusive Education: Polish ExperienceÂ» in Warsaw. The participants of the course are students and the academic staff of the Department of Special and Inclusive Education of the Faculty of Psychology, Social Work, and Special Education. This training course includes lectures, exercises and observations on a wide range of topics related to the education for children and adolescents with diverse educational needs. During the student training and professional development program meetings were held with the Academy's administration concerning further cooperation within the framework of the educational program Â«Strategies and Practices of Inclusive LearningÂ», academic exchanges of students and participation in creating new projects within the Erasmus+ programs. We would like to thank our colleagues in Warsaw for their warm welcome, the opportunity to observe the classes and learn about the practical aspects of integrated and inclusive education.

At Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University the Admission Requirements for 2024 have been published. Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University announced that the Academic Council has approved the Admission Requirements of the University for 2024. They also mentioned the start of registration on May 7 for the Unified Entrance Examination/Unified Professional Entrance Test for applicants to master's and doctoral programs, which will last until May 29. This year the University offers applicants 54 bachelor's degree programs, 56 master's programs, 15 doctoral degree programs, 5 science doctorate programs and 12 programs for the preparation of professional junior bachelor's degrees at the Applied College Â«UniversumÂ». The list of educational programs for admission has been expanded with several new bachelor's programs: Â· Â«Marketing and Digital CommunicationsÂ», Â· Â«Language and Literature (Korean)Â», Â· Â«Drama and Film ActingÂ», Â· Â«Media ProducingÂ», Â· Â«Social PsychologyÂ»; New master's programs: Â· Â«Family PsychologyÂ» Â· Â«Communication Design and Territorial IdentityÂ» The specifics of this year's admission to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv Metropolitan University, the deadlines for submitting applications and documents, the competitive selection process and enrollment are already available on the official website of the institution in the Â«For ApplicantsÂ» section: https://lnkd.in/d7Wn_qaG

May 9th - Europe Day For the past 10 years, alongside the flags of Ukraine, Kyiv, and Grinchenko University, the flag of the European Union has been proudly flying, raised by students as a symbol of dedication to the ideals and values of democracy, emphasizing the European identity of the Ukrainian people.
